sentences.en: Additionally, we are boasting of the biggest synthetic littoral lido in the Huaihai Economic Zone.
sentences.cn: 另设有淮海经济区最大的人造海滨浴场.

sentences.en: Eudora offers a unique environment and menu, located near the Lido Hotel in Northeast Beijing.
sentences.cn: 自开业以来,倍受中外宾客一致好评.

sentences.en: I also know that Lido has gone through a lot of changes in recent years.
sentences.cn: 我也了解到丽都这几年也经历了些变化.

sentences.en: Lido Hotel, Sunshine Plaza, has Asian Games Village.
sentences.cn: 丽都饭店 、 亚运村阳光广场都有.

sentences.en: We enjoy Beijing and above all Lido.
sentences.cn: 我们喜欢北京,喜欢丽都的一切.

words.tran_cn: 海水浴场；公共露天游泳池；海滨游乐园（尤指远洋客轮上的）

trans.tran_en: an outdoor public area, often at a beach, lake etc, for swimming and lying in the sun
